question: What will be the price of Bitcoin (BTC/USD) at 11 PM UTC on December 15, 2025?
description: Predict Bitcoin's price on December 15 at 11 PM UTC. Current price: ~$89.7K
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Bitcoin (BTC/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at exactly 23:00:00 UTC on December 15, 2025.

Resolution process:
• Price will be fetched from CoinGecko API at the exact resolution time
• The final price will be rounded to the nearest dollar for settlement
• Only the CoinGecko API (https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/price?ids=bitcoin&vs_currencies=usd) will be used as the authoritative data source
• Market range: $87,200 - $92,200 (100 buckets × $50)
